source:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Able though he may be, there are some situations which Yazel Ahuatan the Able cannot resolve by himself.
※The crafting portion of this quest is recommended for Disciples of the Hand level 1 and above, and the battle portion for Disciples of War or Magic level 41 and above.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
※本クエストは、クラフタークラス：レベル1以上、
　バトルクラス：レベル41以上推奨です。

エカトル実験場の職工のヤゼル・アファタンは、冒険者に切実な依頼があるようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_SEQ_01Yazel Ahuatan has asked you to craft a bladder lining component so that he might mollify Methuli Cattlan. He has provided the materials, but the facilities are another matter; only those in Hyrstmill, under the care of Dametta, will do. Journey to the hamlet and request her permission.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_SEQ_01※本クエストには「 レベルアジャスト」が、
　設定されています。

職工のヤゼル・アファタンから「」の製作を依頼された。ハーストミルの「アメッタ」に製作施設の使用許可をもらおう。

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_SEQ_02<tab>Dametta is willing to grant you permission to use her facilities─provided you carry out a simple task in exchange. She has prepared a hearty meal for Paulemont, a Wood Wailer stationed at E<var 1F /var>Tatt's Spire. You need only deliver the meal and return with the sack which held her previous delivery. Alternatively, you could converse with the woman further and attempt to persuade her...but that approach may not end well.
target: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_SEQ_02<tab>製作施設を使う条件として、アメッタから弁当の配達を頼まれた。エ・タッタ監視哨の「ポールモン」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89E101 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_SEQ_03<tab>Paulemont is relieved to receive the meal from someone other than Dametta for a change. He presses an empty sack into your hands and insists that you not forget to return it to his benefactor.
target: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_SEQ_03<tab>ポールモンに無事、弁当を届けた。ハーストミルの「アメッタ」に証拠の品「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89E201 /var>」と「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89E001 /var>」を渡し、製作施設の使用許可をもらおう。

source:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_SEQ_04The sack serves both to inflame Dametta's passions and satisfy her requirements. With the materials provided to you by Yazel Ahuatan, synthesize a bladder lining component, and deliver it to him at Ehcatl.

※In the event that the status Facility Access: Production wears off or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with Dametta.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_SEQ_04製作施設の準備が整った。「」をもとに「」を製作し、エカトル実験場の「職工のヤゼル・アファタン」に納品しよう。

※バフステータス「製作施設：部材工作」が終了した場合や、「」を失った場合は、再びアメッタに話しかけましょう。バフステータスと材料が付与され、再挑戦が可能になります。

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_SEQ_05<tab>Yazel Ahuatan accepts your work with a mighty squa-hawk, certain that it will meet with Methuli's satisfaction. The most modest of Ixal's posterior shall remain pristine...until next he incurs the wrath of the Hard.
target: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_SEQ_05<tab>職工のヤゼル・アファタンに<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8092)) 01 /var>を納品した。メトゥリの姐御に臀部の羽毛をむしられずに済んだ彼は、冒険者に心から謝意を表した。熟練の職工の心胆を寒からしめる姐御のお仕置きとは、どれほど苛烈なのだろうか……。
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_TODO_00<tab>ハーストミルのアメッタと話す

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the handmade meal to Paulemont.
target: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_TODO_01<tab>エ・タッタ監視哨のポールモンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89E101 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_TODO_02<tab>Present the empty meal sack and the bladder lining component materials to Dametta.
target: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_TODO_02<tab>ハーストミルのアメッタに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89E201 /var>と<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89E001 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_TODO_03<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize a bladder lining component)) ((Deliver the bladder lining component to Yazel Ahuatan the Able)) /var>.
target: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_TODO_03<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((製作手帳 蛮族クエストLv1：<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8092)) 01 /var>を製作)) ((職工のヤゼル・アファタンに<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8092)) 01 /var>を納品)) /var>

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_YAZELAHUATAN_000_000<tab>Squa-hawk! The one who too would be able, come, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is! Then to Yazel, lend a hand, that we might both escape the claws of the Hard!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_YAZELAHUATAN_000_000、手を貸してくれッェー！
「」をそろえんと、
メトゥリの姐御にケツの羽根までむしられるんじゃッァ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_YAZELAHUATAN_000_010<tab>Pluck my posterior bare, she shall, if rings of metal for the bladder lining we do not provide!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_YAZELAHUATAN_000_010気嚢の形を保持するための骨組みリング……
あれを作るための軽金属板が足りんのじゃッァ！
材料だけは、どうにかそろえたんだがッァ……！

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_YAZELAHUATAN_000_020<tab>Pluck my posterior bare, she shall, if water-resistant paint for the bladder lining we do not provide!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_YAZELAHUATAN_000_020気嚢の表面に塗るための塗料……
特に耐水性を高める塗料が必要なんじゃッァ！
材料だけは、どうにかそろえたんだがッァ……！

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_YAZELAHUATAN_000_030<tab>Pluck my posterior bare, she shall, if leather-backed plywood for the bladder lining we do not provide!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_YAZELAHUATAN_000_030気嚢の強度を高めるための部材……
裏張りする生地や木材が足りんのじゃッァ！
材料だけは、どうにかそろえたんだがッァ……！

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_YAZELAHUATAN_000_040<tab>Able to craft this component himself, Yazel is, were it not for Ehcatl's dearth of facilities. Squa-hawk! Those of Hyrstmill, suffice they shall, but welcome within their walls, Yazel is not. With featherless chatterbox, featherless <var 08 E905 ((craftswoman)) ((craftsman)) /var> should speak.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_YAZELAHUATAN_000_040アンタならハーストミルって集落にも入れるだろッォ？
あそこに「」を作れる丈夫な作業台があるッゥ！
「アメッタ」って女に設備を借りて、製作してきてくれッェ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_YAZELAHUATAN_000_050<tab>Highly unattractive, Yazel's posterior would be, if plucked bare of feathers. For the sake of Ixali maidens, with my materials and the featherless chatterbox's facilities, craft the component we require! Squa-hawk!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_YAZELAHUATAN_000_050ハーストミルで「」を製作してきてくれッェ！
「アメッタ」って女に設備が借りられるッゥ。
このままじゃ、姐御にケツの羽根までむしられちまうッゥ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_DAMETTA_000_060<tab>I know that look─you've a mind to use these facilities, don't you? It's hardly the first time, suffice it to say. I find it quite flattering, actually─and who wouldn't? That the facilities I've worked so hard to maintain are in such high demand is high praise indeed!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_DAMETTA_000_060あー、あんた職人さんだね？
はいはい、心得てるよ。
ここの作業台を使って、仕事したいってんだろ？

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_DAMETTA_000_061<tab>However! That same demand means that I cannot allow unrestricted access, I'm sorry to say. Oh, don't look at me like that! Can you imagine the state they would be in if I let every traveler have the run of the place? It'd be no better than a pigsty!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_DAMETTA_000_061こっちはかまわないけど、ひとつお願いがあるんだよね。
鬼哭隊の隊士さんに、差し入れを届けておくれよ。
最近、魔物が多くてねぇ、女ひとりで出歩くのは危険なのさ。

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_DAMETTA_000_062<tab>But worry not! You may use them if you take this lunch to Paulemont at E<var 1F /var>Tatt's Spire. A simple delivery should be no trouble for a strapping adventurer like yourself! Oh, and do remember to bring me any empty containers he may have. I reuse them, you see. One must <var 1A 02 /var>never<var 1A 01 /var> be wasteful!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_DAMETTA_000_062届け先はエ・タッタ監視哨の「ポールモン」って人だよ。
ちゃんと届けた証拠に、
「」を受け取ってきてよ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_DAMETTA_000_070<tab>Paulemont never leaves his post, so I've no doubt you'll find him at E<var 1F /var>Tatt's Spire. Nevertheless, I pray you don't take too long to deliver it! Meals are always best served fresh!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_DAMETTA_000_070おや、あんたヒマなのかい？
じゃあちょっと、話を聞いていくかい？
頼んだ差し入れは、別に急ぎの仕事じゃないからさ。

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_DAMETTA_000_071<tab>Such a dedicated Wailer, Paulemont is─and kind, too! I used to send him Mun<var 1F /var>Tuy tonic, and do you know what he did? He shared it with his comrades when supplies ran low!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_DAMETTA_000_071ポールモンさんは、ここら一帯の警備をしてる隊士さんでね。
いつもご苦労さんって、ムントゥイ豆乳をおすそわけしたら、
すっかり気に入ってくれたんだよ。

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_DAMETTA_000_072<tab>Just between you and me, he's quite handsome too! Much more than my husband, that's for sure. Oh, but don't go getting any ideas─I'd never do anything <var 1A 02 /var>indecent<var 1A 01 /var>. But a woman has eyes, you know!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_DAMETTA_000_072それから、豆乳だけじゃなく、弁当も差し入れしてるのさ。
ウチの旦那より、よっぽど男前だし……そのうえ…………
…………真面目なもんで………ただねぇ…………

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_DAMETTA_000_073<tab>Like the other day, when a horde of ravenous opo<var 1F /var>opos burst through the gates and began raiding our storehouses, a party of courageous adventurers came to our defense. So strong and skilled they were─and <var 1A 02 /var>fetching<var 1A 01 /var> too! One young man in particular had such <var 1A 02 /var>lovely<var 1A 01 /var> arms, and for a moment I couldn't help but imagine them wrapped around me...
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_DAMETTA_000_073……本当にオポオポは………………しつこくて……
…………参っちまうよね……だいたいあいつら……
……そう、少しは…………加減ってものを…………

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_SYSTEM_100_073<tab>As Dametta continues to wax poetic about various men, your mind begins to wander...
target: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_SYSTEM_100_073<tab>アメッタの話は続いている……。

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_PAULEMONT_000_080<tab>Gods save me, today's the day, isn't it? She'll be here any moment...
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_PAULEMONT_000_080アメッタさん特製の弁当を待ってるんだが、
なかなか届かないな……。
話好きな人だから、誰かと話し込んで遅くなってるのかな？

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_PAULEMONT_000_081<tab>Is that from Dametta? I, uh... Thank you! Here, don't forget this! No need for her to come all this way to fetch an empty sack, am I right?
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_PAULEMONT_000_081おおっ、待っていたよ！
……前回の差し入れの容器も回収してくれるのかい？
じゃあ、この弁当箱をアメッタさんに返却してくれよ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_PAULEMONT_000_090<tab>All things considered, it could be far worse. At least she's not forcing that gods-awful tonic on me anymore.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_PAULEMONT_000_090弁当箱をアメッタさんに返却してくれよ！
よろしくな！

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_DAMETTA_000_100<tab>I do so hope Paulemont wasn't disappointed that I couldn't deliver his meal in person. I trust you've brought the empty sack? Oh, and as a precaution, I must ask that you present your materials for inspection as well. You would be <var 1A 02 /var>shocked<var 1A 01 /var> by what some people have tried to make here, believe me!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_DAMETTA_000_100「」を回収してきたのかい？
だったら約束どおり、ここを使わせてあげなきゃね。
下準備をするから、持ち込んだ材料と一緒に貸してごらん。

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_DAMETTA_000_101<tab>My word, would you look how spotless it is! Nothing more satisfying than seeing that your man─ahem, that your <var 1A 02 /var>friend<var 1A 01 /var> didn't leave a single crumb. Ahem. Ah, yes, your materials! Though unusual, I don't believe they could be used for evil ends. Here you are. You'll note I didn't return them all─there are several times the required materials, it would seem. Whoever entrusted this task to you left a note in the bag: “To featherless neuker, give only required parts. In case of failure, retain spares.” Hmmm... What in the world is a “neuker”?
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_DAMETTA_000_101おやまあ、ずいぶん多めに持ち込んだんだね？
かさばる袋は預かって、材料は製作に必要な分だけ返すよ。
あとはこの場所を、好きに使って製作するんだね！

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_DAMETTA_000_110<tab>Oh, do you require more time with the facilities? By all means, take as long as you like! And if you require additional materials, let me know. I have plenty here for the “featherless neuker.”
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_DAMETTA_000_110材料が足りなくなったり、
またこの場所を使いたくなったら、声をかけてちょうだい。

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_DAMETTA_100_100<tab>Is that the finished product? I...I have no idea what that is, but it looks splendid! I'm sure your client will love it! Ah─it so happens there was another note in the bag: “Retain spare parts, in case featherless neuker loses component en route.” He really doesn't trust you, does he?
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_DAMETTA_100_100仕事は終わったみたいだから、早く納品に行きなよ！
製作した品をなくしたりして、また作りなおすときは、
声をかけておくれ。

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_YAZELAHUATAN_000_130<tab>Feathered, my precious posterior yet is, but not for long if featherless <var 08 E905 ((craftswoman)) ((craftsman)) /var> does not deliver bladder lining component!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_YAZELAHUATAN_000_130おっ、！
「」は完成したかッァ……？

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_YAZELAHUATAN_000_131<tab>Squa-hawk! A gift to the Ehcatl, your craftsmanship is, and a gift to Ixali maidens, Yazel remains! Ah─ Squahaha! Naught more than jest, my words are, of course. Never would Methuli harm his tailfeathers, Yazel knows.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_YAZELAHUATAN_000_131これでメトゥリの姐御にッィ、
ケツの羽根までむしられずに済むッゥ！
助かったわッァ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_YAZELAHUATAN_000_132<tab>(A buzzard to be feared, the Hard is. Ware her claws, lest you suffer her wrath as I have!)
target:
TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_YAZELAHUATAN_000_132姐御は冗談なんて言わねえからなッァ！！
やると言ったら、本気（マジ）でやる女なんじゃッァ！
は、ワシのケツの羽根の恩人じゃあッァ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA102_01495_POPMESSAGE_000_200<tab>You now have access to the crafting facility.
